response.original_title: East of Liberty: The Fear of Us
response.overview: The second film in the "East of Liberty" trilogy, “The Fear of Us” follows small business owners fighting to survive as new businesses emerge designed to cater to a different clientele unlike the ones before. A true examination of survival of the fittest. Featuring interviews with business owners and social examiner Mindy Fullilove, MD (“Root Shock”) and others, “The Fear of Us” digs deep into the issues of class and race as we continue to tackle gentrification issues in redevelopment.
response.title: East of Liberty: The Fear of Us
